# Acquisition of Transient Plane Source, Hot Wire Measuring Platform

## Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Notice Reference Number (NPN):** CB-873-73132351
**Modification Number:** 2
**Solicitation Number:** 23-58224
**Publication Date:** March 15, 2024
**Tender Closing Date (TCD):** April 9, 2024, 14:00:00 (EST)
**Amendment Date:** April 9, 2024

## RFP Overview
The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is soliciting proposals for the acquisition of a Transient Plane Source (TPS), a Transient Hot Wire (THW), and a measuring platform. These instruments will be used to measure the thermal conductivity of materials at transient states for two potential projects: (i) determining moisture content in moisture-contaminated foam insulations, and (ii) measuring the thermal conductivity of concrete for a client project.
